text: I constantly check the lock on my door at least ten times.
I spend hours arranging items on my desk in a specific order.
I frequently re-read messages before sending them.
I always wash my hands repeatedly even when they are clean.
I enjoy hiking and exploring nature during the weekends.
I watch movies with my family every Friday night.
I like to try new recipes and cook for my friends.
I often go cycling in the park to relax.
